@ShinigamiSam3455 It's in the first step of the setup, after you pressed "Install". It asks for a product key. Keys are in Serials.txt. Install the game, close the installation and replace the halo.exe file (in Program Files) by the one into the folder "HALO.EXE PATCHED". Run the Halo CE Crack.exe and the Patch.exe and it should work.
@ShinigamiSam3455 It's in the first step of the installation, when you press "Install". It asks for a product key. (Product keys are in Serials.txt)
